snippet: The singer, pianist and songwriter Tony DeSare, who usually performs standards from the American Songbook, offers more recent fare with a pop-jazz twist at 54 Below.
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews concert of contemporary songs performed by pop-jazz singer and pianist Tony DeSare at 54 Below.
lead_paragraph: The singer, pianist and songwriter Tony DeSare, who usually performs standards from the American Songbook, offers more recent fare with a pop-jazz twist at 54 Below.

headline.seo: Tony DeSare Offers Contemporary Standards at 54 Below
headline.main: From Irving Berlin to Bon Jovi: An American Songbook Devotee Gives Rock Hits a Twist
headline.print_headline: From Irving Berlin to Bon Jovi: An American Songbook Devotee Gives Rock Hits a Twist
